pinyin: si4 hai3 zhi1 nei4 jie1 xiong1 di4

definition: ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous
younger brother/junior male/I (modest word in letter)

sentences.english: Within the four seas all men are brothers.; All the people of the world are brothers.
All men are my brothers yet I am different from each .
sentences.chinese: 四海之内皆兄弟，可我是不同于他人的。

sentences.english: All are brothers within the four seas.
Bunin wrote a lot of novels then including Brothers.
sentences.chinese: 这一期间布宁创作了《四海之内皆兄弟》等著名小说。

sentences.english: And think exactly like me. All men are my brothers.
sentences.chinese: 虽然四海之内皆兄弟，然而我和他们都不一样。

sentences.english: All men on earth are human brothers.
And think exactly like me. All men are my brothers yet I am different from.
sentences.chinese: 虽然四海之内皆兄弟，然而我和他们都不一样。

sentences.english: Within four seas, all men are brothers.
The gentleman worship without loss, purge and polite with people, is within the four seas all men are brothers.
sentences.chinese: 君子敬而无失，与人恭而有礼，四海之内皆兄弟也。

sentences.english: All men are my brothers yet I am different from each.
sentences.chinese: 虽然四海之内皆兄弟，然而人人各异。

definition: a thousand cups of wine is not too much when best friends meet (idiom)/when you're with close friends, you can let your hair down
pinyin: jiu3 feng2 zhi1 ji3 qian1 bei1 shao3

definition: the more friends you have, the more options you have in life (idiom)
pinyin: duo1 ge4 peng2 you3 duo1 tiao2 lu4

definition: To enjoy blessings and endure misfortune together (idiom); for better or for worse
pinyin: you3 fu2 tong2 xiang3 , you3 nan4 tong2 dang1

definition: close friend in a distant land, far-flung realms as next door/close in spirit although far away
pinyin: hai3 nei4 cun2 zhi1 ji3 , tian1 ya2 ruo4 bi3 lin2
related.word: 海内存知己，天涯若比邻

definition: a gentleman's friendship, insipid as water (idiom, from Zhuangzi 莊子|庄子[Zhuang1 zi3])
pinyin: jun1 zi3 zhi1 jiao1 dan4 ru2 shui3

definition: lit. to intervene when one sees an injustice (idiom)/fig. to rush to the rescue/to play the white knight
pinyin: lu4 jian4 bu4 ping2 , ba2 dao1 xiang1 zhu4

definition: lit. persons who walk different paths cannot make plans together/to go separate ways (idiom)
pinyin: dao4 bu4 tong2 bu4 xiang1 wei2 mou2

definition: What you don't want done to you, don't do to others. (idiom, from the Confucian analects)/Do as you would be done by./Do not do to others what you would not have them do to you.
pinyin: ji3 suo3 bu4 yu4 , wu4 shi1 yu2 ren2

definition: to treat one another with absolute sincerity (idiom); to show total devotion
when views are irreconcilable, it's a waste of breath to continue discussion (idiom)
pinyin: hua4 bu4 tou2 ji1 ban4 ju4 duo1

definition: five hundred years ago we were the same family (idiom) (said of persons with the same surname)
